name: Fallin (CryptiCat, Game Dev Técnico, Sonia Costa, Antunes10, Renas, TheDarkRyze)
name_original: Fallin (CryptiCat, Game Dev Técnico, Sonia Costa, Antunes10, Renas, TheDarkRyze)
description:
A girl named Odete rests in the clouds and prepares herself to enter an adventure. 

Built in Unity.

A game developed  by a GameDevTecnico  team for GGJ2021.

Programming: Manuel Guimarães
Sound Design: André Antunes ; Andreia Machado
Visuals: Andreia Machado ; Renata Candeias; Sónia Costa
